page.title: 13Local News, Our Exhibition
page.content: On Friday 14th July 1985 Curry Rivel VC Primary School put on an exhibition. It was an Environmental Studies Exhibition. The topics on display were; Peoples Jobs, Birds, Our Homes, Old Curry Rivel, Buildings in Curry Rivel, Plants, and my class did a display about a camp in the Quantock Hills called Greatwood. We are going to Greatwood at the end of this term for 4 days. Our display also included some work about plants, trees, flowers and birds around the school playground and field to prepare us for our nature studies at Greatwood.I drew and wrote about the Daisy, Buttercup, Nettle, Creeping Speedwell, Venus Looking Glass and the Cypress. Also on display were the old school registers and log books and people could walk in and find their names or their relatives' names. Our exhibition was a success.
